response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for you. This exceptional item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and we are excited to offer it to you at a special price. Our proposal is to extend this opportunity to you for a limited time at $1,400,000. This offer is designed to bring you closer to achieving your goals while ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. We believe in fostering long-term relationships and trust, and we are confident that this product will significantly contribute to your success. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1400000}
